sentences.sContent: The insecurity of the venture kept investors away.
sentences.sContent_eng: The insecurity of the venture kept investors away.
sentences.sCn: 这种冒险事业的不安全性使投资者望而却步。

sentences.sContent: Conceit,in many cases, describes a state of serious emotional insecurity.
sentences.sContent_eng: Conceit,in many cases, describes a state of serious emotional insecurity.
sentences.sCn: 在许多情况下，自负表示一种严重的情绪上的惶惶不安的心理状态。

sentences.sContent: Poverty and insecurity are two of the greatest threats to “harmony” – a word at the core of the WHO Constitution, but one we rarely hear today.
sentences.sContent_eng: Poverty and insecurity are two of the greatest threats to “harmony” – a word at the core of the WHO Constitution, but one we rarely hear today.
sentences.sCn: 贫困和不安全是对“和谐”一词的两个最大威胁，这个词是《世界卫生组织组织法》的核心词，但是我们今天已很少听到。

synos.tran: 不安全；不牢靠；无把握；心神不定

words.tran: 不安全的；不稳定的；不牢靠的
